Package node

Interface BaseNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, FixtureNode, FixtureNode, LightChainNode, MyNode, Server
public interface BaseNode
Any node implementation should implement this interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BaseNode
    newInstance(Identifier selfId, String nameSpace, MiddleLayer network)
    Creates a new instance of the node.
    void
    onCreate(ArrayList<Identifier> allId)
    This method is called when a new node is created.
    void
    onNewMessage(Identifier originId, Event msg)
    This method is called when a new message is received by the node.
    void
    onStart()
    This method is called when all nodes involved in the simulation have been created, and are ready to start.
    void
    onStop()
    This method is called when the node wants to terminate.

  • Method Details

    • onCreate

      void onCreate(ArrayList<Identifier> allId)
      This method is called when a new node is created. It is used to initialize the node.
      Parameters:
      allId - the identifier of all nodes in the simulation. This includes the current node.

    • onStart

      void onStart()
      This method is called when all nodes involved in the simulation have been created, and are ready to start. It is used to start the node.

    • onStop

      void onStop()
      This method is called when the node wants to terminate. It is used to collect garbage and possibly obtain certain log.

    • onNewMessage

      void onNewMessage(Identifier originId, Event msg)
      This method is called when a new message is received by the node.
      Parameters:
      originId - the ID of the sender node
      msg - the content of the message

    • newInstance

      BaseNode newInstance(Identifier selfId, String nameSpace, MiddleLayer network)
      Creates a new instance of the node.
      Parameters:
      selfId - the ID of the new node
      nameSpace - string tag to virtually group the nodes (with identical tags)
      network - communication network for the new node.
      Returns:
      a new instance of the special node class.
